    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      HuffmanTree deserializeHuffmanTree​(java.lang.String serialized)
      De-serializes the string representation of a Huffman tree back to object form
      java.lang.String encode​(java.util.HashMap codes, java.lang.String input)
      Maps each symbol in the input with the corresponding encoding from the encoding table
      static void generateCodes​(HuffmanTree tree, java.util.HashMap codes, java.lang.String code)
      Recursive helper that generates the encoding table for each individual symbol in the string and stores them in a HashMap
      static java.util.HashMap generateFrequencyTable​(java.lang.String str)
      Generates a frequency table containing the number of occurrences for each individual symbol in the input.
      MinHeap generateHuffmanHeap​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Character,​java.lang.Integer> table, int size)
      Initializes the heap by inserting 1-sized HuffmanTrees into a heap.
      HuffmanTree generateHuffmanTree​(MinHeap heap)
      Generates the final Huffman tree by picking two nodes with the smallest weights and adding them back into the heap until the size of the heap is 1.
      java.lang.String serializeHuffmanTree​(HuffmanTree tree)
      returns a serialized string representation of the Huffman tree

        input - string to be encoded
        Returns:

      • generateHuffmanTree

        public HuffmanTree generateHuffmanTree​(MinHeap heap)
        Generates the final Huffman tree by picking two nodes with the smallest weights and adding them back into the heap until the size of the heap is 1.
        Parameters:
        heap - contains all the nodes as HuffmanTree objects of size 1
        Returns:
        final Huffman tree

      • generateFrequencyTable

        public static java.util.HashMap generateFrequencyTable​(java.lang.String str)
        Generates a frequency table containing the number of occurrences for each individual symbol in the input.
        Parameters:
        str - input string
        Returns:
        the resulting frequency table as a HashMap
